thread.title: Kohl’s Cardholders: TY Beanie Boos 4-Piece Gift Set w/ Insulated Cup Only $5.39 Shipped (Reg. $14)
thread.title_full: Kohl’s Cardholders: TY Beanie Boos 4-Piece Gift Set w/ Insulated Cup Only $5.39 Shipped (Reg. $14)

author: Bryn (Sister Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s Cardholders: TY Beanie Boos 4-Piece Gift Set w/ Insulated Cup Only $5.39 Shipped (Reg. $14)
text:
Hop on over to Kohls.com and grab this TY Beanie Boos 4-piece gift set for just $7.70 (regularly $14). This set includes a TY Beanie Boos insulated cup, 1.0 fl. oz. body mist, 1.0 fl. oz. hand lotion, and lip balm.
Even sweeter, through March 8th, Kohl’s cardholders can use the promo codes MARCH30 for 30% off and FREE4MAR to score free shipping on ANY size order. ALSO, through March 12th, you’ll get $10 in Kohl’s Cash for every $50 you spend.
Kohl’s Cardholder Deal Idea: Buy 1 TY Beanie Boos 4-piece gift set $7.70 (reg. $14) 
Use promo code MARCH30 (30% off)
Use promo code FREE4MAR (free shipping)
Final Cost $5.39 shipped!
Not a Kohl’s cardholder? Save an extra 15% off a $100+ purchase with code CATCH15OFF at checkout (expires 12/31/17). Shipping is free on any order of $75 or starts at $8.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pick up if available near you.
(Thanks, Kasey!)
